column5: My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, business travelers, and families (with kids). The beach is right across the street. There are 2 pools,2 hot tubs, tennis court, and a work out facility. The condo has a large balcony with a view of the pool and ocean. There are restaurants and a grocery store within 2 blocks. Walmart is next door. There is also a fishing pier 1 block away.
